item.title: 【Live Audios (lossless)】FLAC - Melanie C @ Mayan Theatre, Los Angeles, CA 1999-10-07 (audience recording)
item.description:
MELANIE C
LOS ANGELES,CA:MAYAN THEATRE
10/7/99

Sony Clip On Mic -> D8
DA20 -> CDRW700 -> EAC -> Soundforge -> FLAC Frontend Level 8

01. -intro-
02. Something's Gonna Happen
03. Independence Day
04. Northern Star
05. Be The One
06. Ga Ga
07. Suddenly Monday
08. I Turn To You
09. Feel The Sun
10. If That Were Me
11. Goin' Down
12. Anarchy In The U.K. (with Steve Jones)
13. Wannabe
14. I Wonder What It Would Be Like
15. Go
16. Closer
17. Goin' Down (acoustic)

Early show, no opening band, about 400 in attendance with the balcony closed off. She had short black spiky hair and was wearing a CLASH T-Shirt. Great show, proved she had the pipes and can sing great music on her own.

One of my eternal favorites out of thousands of shows I recorded. Always looking for more.

Hidden Content:

item.author: ijwthstd

item.title: 【Live Audios (lossless)】FLAC - Melanie C @ The Mint, Los Angeles, CA 2007-12-06 (audience recording)
item.description:
MELANIE C
LOS ANGELES,CA:THE MINT
12/6/07

DSM6 -> PACLC -> D7
D7 -> 7pin Coaxial -> CDRW700 -> EAC -> Soundforge -> FLAC Frontend Level 8

01. Beautiful Intentions
02. What If I Stay
03. Carolyna
04. Better Alone
05. Here And Now
06. Northern Star
07. Next Best Superstar
08. First Day Of My Life
09. When You're Gone
10. This Time
11. I Turn To You

capacity: 120

Last minute off night show with some members of the Spice Girls touring band.
